title: No balloons allowed: Kuwait issues strict guidelines for National Day 2026 celebrations
summary_full: Kuwait is gearing up for its national celebrations on February 25th with a strong call for responsible festivity. Authorities are urging residents to showcase civic awareness and respect for public spaces, emphasizing that national pride should be demonstrated through clean, safe, and orderly conduct.
